title: I get a message at startup about g.co/ABH, my phone can use the microphone and speaker (pixel 1)
content: At startup of phone, I see g.co/ABH. I can't use microphone even recording video, then I restart or reformat but the same outcome, faulty microphone then also faulty speaker. But there are times when I restarted the phone, I can use microphone and speakers but it will restart then again, faulty microphone and speaker. I reformat the phone 4X but the same result :( .
